column1: Mandalgovi has a cold semi-arid climate (Köppen climate classification BSk) bordering on a cold desert climate (Köppen BWk) with warm summers and very cold winters. Most precipitation falls in the summer as rain. Winters are very dry.
The city is connected to Ulaanbaatar by a 300 km paved road completed in October 2013.
